subject: Basketball
Women
Athletics and Sports
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: NORMAN, Okla. (AP) — Amanda Thompson scored 16 points and No. 11 Oklahoma rebounded from a rare home loss by routing Texas Tech, 78-39, on Wednesday night.
snippet: NORMAN, Okla. (AP) — Amanda Thompson scored 16 points and No. 11 Oklahoma rebounded from a rare home loss by routing Texas Tech, 78-39, on Wednesday night.
